    • isEvaluated

      public boolean isEvaluated(String scope)
      Description copied from interface: Decision
      Checks if the given scope is associated with any policy processed in this decision.
      Specified by:
      isEvaluated in interface Decision<Evaluation>
      Parameters:
      scope - the scope name
      Returns:
      true if the scope is associated with a policy. Otherwise, false.
